clusterExtension.attribute: number of price tiers in use
number of block thresholds in use
domestic fuel tax rate trailing digit
ex number of price tiers in use
ex number of block thresholds in use
ex last billing period consolidated bill

command.name: SswgPublishBlockPeriod
command.description: The PublishBlockPeriod command is generated in response to receiving a GetBlockPeriod(s) command or when an update to the block tariff schedule is available from the commodity provider.

command.name: SswgPublishTariffInformation
command.description: The PublishTariffInformation command is sent in response to a GetTariffInformation command or if new tariff information is available (including price matrix and block thresholds).

command.name: SswgPublishPriceMatrix
command.description: PublishPriceMatrix command is used to publish the Block Price Information Set (up to 15 tiers x 15 blocks) and the Extended Price Information Set (up to 48 tiers). The PublishPriceMatrix command is sent in response to a GetPriceMatrix command.

command.name: SswgPublishBlockThreshold
command.description: The PublishBlockThreshold command is sent in response to a GetBlockThreshold command.

command.name: SswgPublishConversionFactor
command.description: The PublishConversionFactor command is sent in response to a GetConversionFactor command or if a new Conversion factor is available.

command.name: SswgPublishCalorificValue
command.description: The PublishCalorificValue command is sent in response to a GetCalorificValue command or if a new calorific value is available.

command.name: SswgPublishCO2Value
command.description: The PublishCO2Value command is sent in response to a GetCO2Value command or if a new CO2 conversion factor is available.

command.name: SswgPublishCppEvent
command.description: The PublishCPPEvent command is sent from an ESI to its price clients to notify them of a Critical Peak Pricing event.

command.name: SswgPublishBillingPeriod
command.description: The PublishBillingPeriod command is generated in response to receiving a GetBillingPeriod(s) command or when an update to the Billing schedule is available from the commodity Supplier.

command.name: SswgPublishConsolidatedBill
command.description: The PublishConsolidatedBill command is used to make consolidated billing information of previous billing periods available to other end devices. This command is issued in response to a GetConsolidatedBill command or if new billing information is available.

command.name: SswgPublishCreditPayment
command.description: The PublishCreditPayment command is used to update the credit payment information is available.

command.name: SswgPublishCurrencyConversion
command.description: The PublishCurrencyConversion command is sent in response to a GetCurrencyConversion command or when a new currency becomes available.

command.name: SswgGetTariffInformation
command.description: This command initiates a PublishTariffInformation command for the scheduled tariff updates.

command.name: SswgGetPriceMatrix
command.description: This command initiates a PublishPriceMatrix command for the scheduled Price Matrix updates.

command.name: SswgGetBlockThresholds
command.description: This command initiates a PublishBlockThreshold command for the scheduled Block Threshold updates.

command.name: SswgGetConversionFactor
command.description: This command initiates a PublishConversionFactor command for the scheduled conversion factor updates.

command.name: SswgGetCalorificValue
command.description: This command initiates a PublishCalorificValue command for the scheduled conversion factor updates.

command.name: SswgGetCO2Value
command.description: This command initiates a PublishCO2Value command for the scheduled CO2 conversion factor updates.

command.name: SswgGetBillingPeriod
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishBillingPeriod commands for the currently scheduled billing periods.

command.name: SswgGetConsolidatedBill
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishConsolidatedBill commands with the requested billing information.

command.name: SswgCppEventResponse
command.description: The CPPEventResponse command is sent from a Client (IPD) to the ESI to notify them of a Critical Peak Pricing event authorisation.

command.name: SswgGetCurrencyConversionCommand
command.description: This command initiates a PublishCurrencyConversion command for the currency conversion factor updates. A server shall be capable of storing both the old and the new currencies.

clusterExtension.attribute: demand limit arm duration in minutes
current no tier block 1 summation received
current no tier block 2 summation received
current no tier block 3 summation received
current no tier block 4 summation received
current no tier block 5 summation received
current no tier block 6 summation received
current no tier block 7 summation received
current no tier block 8 summation received
current no tier block 9 summation received
current no tier block 10 summation received
current no tier block 11 summation received
current no tier block 12 summation received
current no tier block 13 summation received
current no tier block 14 summation received
current no tier block 15 summation received
current no tier block 16 summation received

command.name: SswgGetSnapshotResponse
command.description: This command is used to send snapshot data to the client.

command.name: SswgScheduleSnapshotResponse
command.description: This command is used to tell the cluster server to take a snapshot.

command.name: SswgGetSnapshot
command.description: This command is used to request the cluster server for snapshot data.

command.name: SswgTakeSnapshot
command.description: This command is used to tell the cluster server to take a snapshot.

command.name: SswgMirrorReportAttributeResponse
command.description: This command is sent in response to the ReportAttribute command when the corresponding Enable Bit of the MirrorControl attribute is set.

command.name: SswgScheduleSnapshot
command.description: This command is used to set up a schedule of when the device shall create snapshot data.

command.name: SswgMessageConfirmation
command.description: Command description for SswgMessageConfirmation

command.name: SswgGetSupportedTunnelProtocols
command.description: Get Supported Tunnel Protocols is the client command used to determine the Tunnel protocols supported on another device.

command.name: SswgSupportedTunnelProtocolsResponse
command.description: Supported Tunnel Protocol Response is sent in response to a Get Supported Tunnel Protocols command previously received.

cluster.name: Prepayment
cluster.description: The Prepayment Cluster provides the facility to pass messages relating to prepayment between devices on the HAN.

command.name: SswgSelectAvailableEmergencyCredit
command.description: This command is sent to the Metering Device to activate the use of any Emergency Credit available on the Metering Device.

command.name: SswgChangeDebt
command.description: The ChangeDebt command is send to the Metering Device to change the fuel or Non fuel debt values.

command.name: SswgEmergencyCreditSetup
command.description: This command is a method to set up the parameters for the emergency credit.

command.name: SswgConsumerTopUp
command.description: The ConsumerTopUp command is used by the IPD and the ESI as a method of applying credit top up values to the prepayment meter.

command.name: SswgCreditAdjustment
command.description: The CreditAdjustment command is sent to update the accounting base for the Prepayment meter.

command.name: SswgChangePaymentMode
command.description: This command is sent to a Metering Device to instruct it to change its mode of operation. i.e. from Credit to Prepayment.

command.name: SswgGetPrepaySnapshot
command.description: This command is used to request the cluster server for snapshot data.

command.name: SswgGetTopUpLog
command.description: This command is sent to the Metering Device to retrieve the log of Top Up codes received by the meter.

command.name: SswgSetLowCreditWarningLevel
command.description: This command is sent to the Metering Device to set the warning level for low credit. It can be sent from either the HES or the IHU.

command.name: SswgGetDebtRepaymentyLog
command.description: This command is used to request the contents of the repayment log.

command.name: SswgGetPrepaySnapshotResponse
command.description: This command is used to send snapshot data to the client.

command.name: SswgChangePaymentModeResponse
command.description: This command is send in response to the ChangePaymentMode Command.

command.name: SswgConsumerTopUpResponse
command.description: Metering device responses either with amount available in the Top Up and Credit remaining after addition of this Top Up when Top up code is supplied or with supply status (after implementation) when connect/disconnect top up code is supplied.

command.name: SswgGetCommand
command.description: The Get Command is used only when a BOMD Meter is being mirrored.

command.name: SswgPublishTopUpLog
command.description: This command is used to send the Top Up Code Log entries to the client.

command.name: SswgPublishDebtLog
command.description: This command is used to send the contents of the repayment log.

command.name: SswgPublishCalendar
command.description: The PublishCalendar command is sent in response to a GetCalendar command or if new calendar information is available.

command.name: SswgPublishDayProfile
command.description: The PublishDayProfile command is sent in response to a GetDayProfile command.

command.name: SswgPublishWeekProfile
command.description: The PublishWeekProfile command is sent in response to a GetWeekProfile command.

command.name: SswgPublishSeasons
command.description: The PublishSeasons command is sent in response to a GetSeason command.

command.name: SswgPublishSpecialDays
command.description: The PublishSpecialDays command is sent in response to a GetSpecialDays command or if a calendar update is available.

command.name: SswgGetCalendar
command.description: This command initiates a PublishCalendar command for the scheduled TOU Calendar updates.

command.name: SswgGetDayProfiles
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishDayProfile command for the referenced TOU Calendar.

command.name: SswgGetWeekProfiles
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishWeekProfile command for the referenced TOU Calendar.

command.name: SswgGetSeasons
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishSeasons command for the referenced TOU Calendar.

command.name: SswgGetSpecialDays
command.description: This command initiates one or more PublishSpecialDay command for the scheduled Special Day Table updates.

cluster.name: Device Management
cluster.attribute: ex proposed supplier change date time
change of tenancy update date time
extended meter alarm status register changed
disconnection due to cut off valve
physical attack on the prepay meter
electronic attack on the prepay meter
set low credit warning level received
set low credit warning level actioned
set low credit warning level cancelled
set low credit warning level rejected
device management disconnection due to tamper

command.name: SswgGetChangeOfTenancy
command.description: This command is used to request the ESI to update any device that is bound to it when the next change of Tenancy is.

command.name: SswgGetChangeOfSupplier
command.description: This command is used to request the ESI to update any device that is bound to it when the next change of Supplier is.

command.name: SswgGetChangeSupply
command.description: This command is used to request the ESI to update any device that is bound to it what the last change in supply was or is pending.

command.name: SswgSupplyStatusResponse
command.description: This command is transmitted by a Metering Device in response to a Change Supply command.

command.name: SswgGetPassword
command.description: This command is used to request the current password from the server.

command.name: SswgPublishChangeOfTenancy
command.description: This command is used to change the tenancy of a meter.

command.name: SswgPublishChangeOfSupplier
command.description: This command is used to change the Supplier (energy supplier) that is supplying the meter (s).

command.name: SswgChangeSupply
command.description: This command is sent to the Metering Device to instruct it to change the status of the valve or disconnector, i.e. the Supply.

command.name: SswgChangePassword
command.description: This command is used to send the current password the client.

command.name: SswgLocalChangeSupply
command.description: This command is a simplified version of the change supply command intended to be sent from an IPD to a meter as the consequence of a user action on the IPD.

command.name: SswgUpdateSiteId
command.description: This command is used to set the siteID.

command.name: SswgPublishEventLog
command.description: This command is generated by the metering device on receipt of a Get Event Log Command.

command.name: SswgGetEventLog
command.description: The server generates this command when interrogating the event logs.
